UPDATE users
user_name = #{new_user_name}, user_phone = #{new_user_phone},
user_pw = #{new_user_pw}, question_id = #{new_question_id}, question_answer = #{new_question_answer}, user_salt = #{new_user_salt}, user_pw_change_time = NOW(),
user_gender = #{new_user_gender},
